text: 20 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Aurora Cannabis Announces Final Regulatory Approval For Cannimed Therapeutics Acquisition Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Aurora Cannabis Inc: * AURORA CANNABIS ANNOUNCES FINAL REGULATORY APPROVAL FOR CANNIMED THERAPEUTICS ACQUISITION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
